About Executive MBA

The AGH Executive Master of Business Administration program focuses on advanced management and economics, accounting and finance, marketing, and psychology of management, as well as production management and decision-making. As a participant in this program, offered at AGH University of Science and Technology, students will benefit from a world-class education imparted by esteemed tutors who are at the forefront of their respective fields.
 The primary goal of the Executive Master of Business Administration program is to equip participants with the intellectual acumen, technical competencies, and professional confidence required to excel in today's fast-paced, technology-driven business environment.

“Innovation is the hallmark of true leaders, it sets them apart from those who simply follow.”

A rigorous academic curriculum

A network spanning the globe

A diverse participant population

Opportunities to engage with industry experts

Who are we looking for?

The AGH Executive Master of Business Administration program is specifically crafted for mid-career managers and executives seeking to enhance their skills and advance their careers in the ever-evolving landscape of technology. With a focus on providing a world-class education in a streamlined, yet comprehensive format, this program is ideal for executives seeking to stay ahead of the curve in today's rapidly changing business environment.

Executive MBA is meticulously tailored for:

Experienced and ambitious managers

Professionals with a passion for growth and success

Collaborations

At MBA TECH, we understand the importance of practical, industry-relevant education. That's why we've partnered with the biggest and most innovative companies in the tech industry to provide our participants with a world-class educational experience.

Teaching Team Members

It's not just about what you will learn – it's about who you will meet. You will be working on projects with real-world applications, collaborating with industry experts, and networking with fellow professionals.

Read more about Teaching Team Members

Requirements for Applications

Bachelor's or Master's degree from an accredited university.

Resume: A detailed resume highlighting the candidate's work experience, education, and professional achievements.

Fluent English language capability.

Personal Statements: The candidate's insights into their motivation for pursuing an Executive MBA, professional goals, and fit with the program through personal statements.
